messages.message:
Thanks, we don't have a way to steer a chatbot using a custom instruction (JIRA) (https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-1285) yet, we'll evaluate for Q3. @jean do we need to include the deprecated docs in the chatbot info? Or could we add a note at the top of the deprecated docs which says that this document is deprecated and we recommend using the latest AI Hub endpoints?

cc: @Sławek Biel @Hari in case you have any ideas here

We can definitely disinclude deprecated docs! Anyone using deprecated endpoints still will not be able to get answers from docsbot about them---as long as that’s okay, we can just delete those docs from the chatbot. @avi @Kaustubh (KD)
Oh, yeah, the deprecated docs *do* have a big red note at the top of the page already, @Kaustubh (KD). In any case, I removed them from the docsbot.
